text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @ICEgov Meantime Anti-face mask MAGA lovers, press forward with Donald’s example of no mask in public. Florida Walmart shopper brandishes gun in apparent dispute over coronavirus masks. Whatever happened to leading by example? 
https://t.co/SP8S3gzJR7
